description: Predefined reports for each module. We use Tremor for data visualization.
newUsersByMonthOverall: Number of new users by month (Overall)
newUsersByMonth2023: Number of new users by month (2023)
newUsersByMonth2024: Number of new users by month (2024)
clientsDistribution: Distribution of clients across different statuses
propertiesDistribution: Distribution of properties across different statuses
